yo.applab.ckwinfo
Class SearchActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      yo.applab.ckwinfo.SearchActivity

public class SearchActivity
extends Activity

Responsible for constructing, displaying keyword option sequences, and submitting search queries.

void collectSearchStateData(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> aList,
                            int pos,
                            boolean done,
                            boolean send)
Method for collecting search activity data on orientation change.

Parameters:
aList - The current searched list.
pos - The current search sequence position
done - True if the search has reached its end
send - Set to true to send data
